example.name: transitive--note the arg3!
example.text: In all, [the company]-1 hopes *trace*-1 to repay $45 million in debt through the sales, which will completely discharge its secured debt, the company said.
example.arg: through the sales, which will completely discharge its secured debt

example.name: args 1 2 3
example.text: The merger agreement says [the buy-out group]-1 is entitled [*trace-1*]-2 to be repaid *trace-2* $26.7 million in fees for its investment bankers, Lazard Freres & Co. and Salomon Brothers Inc., and its law firm, Paul Weiss Rifkind Wharton & Garrison.
example.arg: for its investment bankers, Lazard Freres& Co. and Salomon Brothers Inc., and its law firm, Paul Weiss Rifkind Wharton & Garrison

example.name: price as subject
example.text: The buy-out group is also entitled to $16 million [0]-1 *trace*-1 to repay a fund created by the pilots union for an employee stock ownership plan.
example.arg: a fund created by the pilots union for an employee stock ownership plan

example.text: Mary repaid John with a slap in the face for his impertinence.
